tekst: Overall, I am satisfied with the recommender.
I feel in control of modifying my preferences.
The recommender allows me to modify my preferences.
I found it easy to modify my preferences in the recommender
The recommender helped me find the ideal song.
Using the recommender to find what I like is easy.
The recommender gave me good suggestions.
The songs recommended to me matched my interests.
I found it easy to tell the system what I like/dislike.
The recommender system helped me discover new songs.
